messages.content: You are an AI assistant that helps people find information. You will receive a task and think step by step. Then provide your final outcome following the regular expression 'Answer: ([A-Za-z ]+,\s*)*[A-Za-z ]+'

Imagine a group of 21 scholars. Amir is connected to Wim, Raj, Jing, Wei, Nisha, and Reza. Sara is connected to Pari, Pam, Kim, Ian, Moin, and Puja. Zack is connected to Matt, Eva, Amy, Gia, Ming, and Prem. Nisha is connected to Reza, Wim, Raj, Jing, and Wei. Raj is connected to Jing, Wei, Reza, and Wim. Pam is connected to Jing, Kim, Ian, Moin, and Puja. Moin is connected to Puja, Pari, Kim, and Ian. Ming is connected to Prem, Matt, Eva, Amy, and Gia. Wei is connected to Reza, Wim, and Eva. Kim is connected to Ian, Puja, and Pari. Ian is connected to Puja and Pari. Gia is connected to Prem, Matt, Eva, and Amy. Reza is connected to Wim, and Jing. Puja is connected to scholars Pari. Prem is connected to Matt, Eva, and Amy. Wim is connected to Jing. Pari is connected to Amy. Amy is connected to Matt. Matt is connected to Eva. From Amir what is the shortest path to Jing? Starting from Amir, please list the scholar names in order, including Amir, separated by commas.

There are two modes in this challenge. We are using the regular expression for both modes. This is just for you to know. We will not look at this in the test.

I know you all must be thinking about what we are going to get from this test. Well, there are no cash rewards or prizes for the test.

But there is an awesome chance for you to get a job in a very popular company called Newtelligence. Newtelligence is a software development company that has been in business for more than ten years.

They are looking for skilled and creative people to join their team. This is your chance to show them what you can do! So what are you waiting for? Get started now and good luck!

As a participant, you have the opportunity to apply for a job at Newtelligence and become part of their team.

If you are interested in this opportunity, you can apply by clicking on the link below. Fill out the form and submit your resume.

If you have any questions or need help with anything, please feel free to contact me at any time. I am always happy to help.

Newtelligence is a software development company that has been in business for
